text: "Driver 8" is a 1985 song by alternative rock band R.E.M. and taken from their third studio album Fables of the Reconstruction. It was not released in Europe and did not chart in the United States. ==Track listing== All songs written by Bill Berry, Peter Buck, Mike Mills and Michael Stipe unless otherwise indicated. ===7": IRS / IRS-52678 (US)=== # "Driver 8" - 3:24 # "Crazy" (Pylon) - 3:05 == References == Category:Alternative rock songs Category:Country rock songs Category:1985 songs Category:Hootie & the Blowfish songs Category:R.E.M. songs
title: Driver 8
